name: Garfield Kart: The Visual Novel
description:
Garfield Kart: The Visual Novel! A brand new way to play Garfield Kart.

You play as Vito Cappelletti, the newest Garfield Kart playable character added from The Garfield Show. In this game you get to race on a course designed after Vito Cappelletti himself and talk to all other Garfield Kart characters such as Garfield, Odie, Jon,  null, and more!

(DISCLAIMER: This game contains elements of psychological horror, play at your own risk)
